titles.title: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Securities and Exchange Commission relating to "Regulation S-P: Privacy of Consumer Financial Information and Safeguarding Customer Information".

Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Securities and Exchange Commission relating to "Regulation S-P: Privacy of Consumer Financial Information and Safeguarding Customer Information".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
